name: 陳銘祥
schedule:
Topics:
Week 1 to Week 3: Origins and Foundation of society
Week 4 to Week 7: Development: Social Changes and Transformation
Week 8 to Week 10: Social Fragments and Their Consequences
Week 11 to Week 12: Society in Modern World
Week 13 to Week 16: Society and Othher Social Phenomenon: Culture, Politics, Law, and Economic
scorePolicy:
Requirements:
(1) class participation (20%), including class discussion, presentation, and attitude; and
(2) written assignment (80%), composing for two written essays with moderate length (4 pages).
materials:
Class materials:
There is no textbook. However, students are required to read their class essays and explain them to their peers.
